content.question: Has any of the information about the adultery come from another person?
content.description: The court needs to know if any of this information is second hand.
content.informationGivenQuestion: Which information was given to you?

reasonForDivorceSecondHandInfo.required: Select yes if any of the information had come from another person
reasonForDivorceSecondHandInfo.invalid: Select yes if any of the information had come from another person
